solution_line_template: He cuts {yards_per_day} yards on both Saturday and Sunday so that's {number_of_days}*{yards_per_day} = <<{yards_per_day}*{number_of_days}={total_yards}>>{total_yards} yards
It takes him {minutes_per_yard} minutes to cut 1 yard so it takes him {minutes_per_yard}*{total_yards} = <<{minutes_per_yard}*{total_yards}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes

There are {minutes_per_hour} minutes in 1 hour and it takes him {total_minutes} minutes so that's a total of {total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
